== Kariavattom (627499) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kariavattom is a village in the [[Perinthalmanna]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 1893 hectares and harbouring 2875 households with total population of 15064 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Perinthalmanna]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 7192 and female population is 7872. Scheduled Caste Population is 1714 and Scheduled Tribes population is 11. Census Location Code of the village is 627499<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
